name: althos-backend-serverless
description: Serverless backend for Althos Mental Wellness Platform using Google Cloud Functions

scripts.deploy: npm run build && gcloud functions deploy --gen2
scripts.deploy:journal: gcloud functions deploy journal --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --source dist/functions --entry-point journal
scripts.deploy:ai-coach: gcloud functions deploy ai-coach --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --source dist/functions --entry-point aiCoach
scripts.deploy:tests: gcloud functions deploy tests --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --source dist/functions --entry-point tests
scripts.deploy:mood: gcloud functions deploy mood --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --source dist/functions --entry-point mood
scripts.deploy:shares: gcloud functions deploy shares --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --source dist/functions --entry-point shares
scripts.deploy:health: gcloud functions deploy health --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --source dist/functions --entry-point healthCheck
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:health && npm run deploy:journal && npm run deploy:ai-coach && npm run deploy:tests && npm run deploy:mood && npm run deploy:shares

author: Althos Team
